[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@3rdweb/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [NewSignatureMint](./sdk.newsignaturemint.md)

## NewSignatureMint interface

Represents a new `SignatureMint` request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NewSignatureMint 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [currencyAddress](./sdk.newsignaturemint.currencyaddress.md) | string | The address of the currency used in the event that there is a price set on the token. If this is set to the 0x0 address, then its free to mint. |
|  [id?](./sdk.newsignaturemint.id.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A unique identifier for the voucher.<!-- -->If this value is an empty string, then a uuid-v4 will be generated. |
|  [metadata](./sdk.newsignaturemint.metadata.md) | [MetadataURIOrObject](./sdk.metadatauriorobject.md) | The metadata of the token to generate a signature for. |
|  [price](./sdk.newsignaturemint.price.md) | BigNumberish | The price per the NFT being minted for this particular voucher. |
|  [to](./sdk.newsignaturemint.to.md) | string | The receiver of the NFTs being minted when the voucher is claimed. |
|  [voucherEndTimeEpochSeconds](./sdk.newsignaturemint.voucherendtimeepochseconds.md) | BigNumberish | The epoch end time (in seconds) that essentially invalidates the voucher such that it can no longer be claimed. |
|  [voucherStartTimeEpochSeconds](./sdk.newsignaturemint.voucherstarttimeepochseconds.md) | BigNumberish | The epoch start time (in seconds) when the voucher can be claimed. |
